help: --repository/-R <url>: the full URL of the content repository to clone

--path/-P <path>: The file system path of the content to copy
See the README for the full list
instructions: - If there's a default value, Enter one or more spaces to return an empty value
content_instructions: - If your site content is already available in a folder or repository, you can configure this here
- If you don't provide a source, a sample site will be created.
If there's a default value, Enter one or more spaces to set an empty value.
prompt_repo: Optional content source: url of site repository to clone, OR path of the site folder on your file system
prompt_content_folder: path of content folder relative to content root
prompt_content_index: path of the folder that contains your index file, relative to the content root
prompt_locale_root: path of the locales, relative to the site root
prompt_style_root: path of styles folder relative to site root
prompt_style_index: path of your main scss file, relative to the styles root
prompt_assets_root: path of assets folder relative to site root
prompt_langs: Site languages, as a comma/space separated list
prompt_branch: branch to clone from site repository
prompt_site_config: yaspp.config.json found in content. Use this file
err_tools: Create-yaspp requires git and yarn to run properly
err_config_file: Config file not found or invalid
err_partial_setup: The project is set up but some final operations failed
